translation.en: [narrator] It's been over 75 years
translation.zh: ‎自从一个美国夜间战斗机中队

translation.en: since a United States Night Fighter Squadron
translation.zh: ‎观察到一架所谓的喷火战机

translation.en: observed the so-called Foo Fighters high over
translation.zh: ‎在第二次世界大战期间

translation.en: the Franco-German border during World War II.
translation.zh:
‎在法国和德国边境的高空飞行
‎已经过去75年多了

translation.en: But the fact is that it was just a prelude to the UFO phenomenon,
translation.zh:
‎但事实是
‎这只是不明飞行物现象的开端

translation.en: the start of which coincided with the most deadly period in human history.
translation.zh:
‎它的开始恰逢
‎人类历史上最致命的时期

translation.en: The Second World War in Europe ended in May 1945,
translation.zh:
‎1945年5月
‎欧洲的第二次世界大战结束

translation.en: but it was to be several months later
translation.zh: ‎但人类历史上最可怕的冲突

translation.en: before the most horrific conflict in human history reached a conclusion.
translation.zh: ‎要在几个月后才走向尾声

translation.en: In August, the US military dropped nuclear bombs
translation.zh: ‎美军在八月向日本的

translation.en: on the Japanese cities of Hiroshima and Nagasaki.
translation.zh: ‎广岛和长崎 投放了两颗原子弹

translation.en: The Soviets tested their first atomic bomb on the steppes in what is now Kazakhstan
translation.zh:
‎1949年8月29日 ‎在现在的哈萨克斯坦大草原上
‎苏联人试验了他们的第一颗原子弹

translation.en: on August 29th, 1949,
translation.zh:
‎在现在的哈萨克斯坦大草原上
‎苏联人试验了他们的第一颗原子弹

translation.en: triggering the onset of the tense 40-year nuclear standoff
translation.zh: ‎这引发了苏联和美国之间

translation.en: between Russia and the United States…
translation.zh: ‎长达40年形势紧张的核对峙

translation.en: The Cold War.
translation.zh: ‎也就是冷战

translation.en: At some point, perhaps when this problem with the Soviet Union was resolved
translation.zh:
‎某个时候 也许是在美国和苏联
‎之间这个问题解决之后

translation.en: and we got on the same page and was like, oh, okay, great,
translation.zh:
‎我们会达成共识 都说：
‎“好的 棒极了”

translation.en: you know, you're communists, we're capitalists, but that's fine. You…
translation.zh:
‎“你们是共产主义
‎我们是资本主义 但没关系”

translation.en: You helped win the war. Let's work together. That didn't happen.
translation.zh:
‎“你们帮助赢得了战争胜利
‎我们一起合作吧” 但这并未发生

translation.en: What happened was trillions and trillions of modern dollars
translation.zh: ‎发生的是 数以万亿计的现代美元

translation.en: were spent on building 70,000 nuclear warheads.
translation.zh: ‎都用在了建造七万个核弹头上

translation.en: Then nuclear submarines,
translation.zh: ‎还有核潜艇上

translation.en: putting them on tracks, putting them on launchpads,
translation.zh:
‎把它们放在轨道上
‎把它们放上发射台

translation.en: putting them underwater,
translation.zh: ‎把它们放入水下

translation.en: so that they could-- you could be dead 12 seconds after the war began.
translation.zh: ‎这样你能在战争开始的12秒后就死掉

translation.en: [narrator] Could we be on the verge of another deadly conflict?
translation.zh:
‎我们会不会处在
‎另一场致命冲突的边缘？

translation.en: These series of nuclear tests were preceded by astonishing events.
translation.zh:
‎在这一系列核试验之前
‎发生了一些令人震惊的事件

translation.en: Events that raised a completely different kind of concern
translation.zh:
‎这些事件
‎引发了另一种完全不同的担忧

translation.en: and helped precipitate the creation of many top secret projects.
translation.zh: ‎帮助促成了许多绝密项目的诞生

translation.en: Projects which have remained top secret until now.
translation.zh: ‎这些项目直到现在都是最高机密

translation.en: [narrator] June, 1947.
In the skies above Washington State, close to Mount Rainier,
translation.zh:
‎在华盛顿州上空
‎靠近雷尼尔山的地方

translation.en: private pilot Kenneth Arnold
translation.zh: ‎私人飞行员肯尼斯· 阿诺德

translation.en: reported sighting a formation of unidentified flying crafts.
translation.zh: ‎报告说看到一组不明飞行物编队

translation.en: Arnold's account led to the press
translation.zh:
‎阿诺德的描述
‎让媒体迅速创造了“飞船”

translation.en: quickly coining the terms "flying saucer" and "flying disc"
translation.zh:
‎阿诺德的描述
‎让媒体迅速创造了“飞船” ‎和“飞碟”这些名词

translation.en: as popular descriptions for Unidentified Flying Objects.
translation.zh: ‎用于对不明飞行物体的通俗描述

translation.en: One month later, the most notorious UFO sighting in history occurred.
translation.zh:
‎一个月后 历史上最著名的
‎目击不明飞行物事件发生了

translation.en: July, 1947. Roswell, New Mexico.
translation.zh:
‎1947年7月
‎在美国新墨西哥州的罗斯威尔

translation.en: Major Jesse A. Marcel, Air Force Intelligence Officer,
translation.zh: ‎空军情报员杰西·马塞尔少校

translation.en: arrived home to his house in Roswell.
translation.zh: ‎回到了他在罗斯威尔的家

translation.en: He walked into his ten-year-old son's bedroom and woke him up,
translation.zh: ‎他走进他十岁儿子的卧室 ‎把儿子叫醒

translation.en: saying that he would probably never again see what he was about to show him,
translation.zh:
‎说他要展示给儿子的东西
‎他可能以后再也不会见到了

translation.en: items recovered from inside a UFO.
translation.zh: ‎一个从不明飞行物里面回收的物品

translation.en: [Marcel] There was a lot of rather thick foil-like…
translation.zh:
‎有很多相当厚的
‎像铝箔一样的材料 某种…

translation.en: material, kind of a…
translation.zh:
‎有很多相当厚的
‎像铝箔一样的材料 某种… ‎（小杰西·马塞尔 目击者）

translation.en: not a shiny aluminum, but burnished or a slate grey type of aluminum metal.
translation.zh:
‎不是有光泽的铝 而是一种抛光过的
‎或板岩灰色的金属铝

translation.en: Uh, there was a black plastic-type debris like bait light which was shattered.
translation.zh:
‎有一种黑色的塑料碎片
‎像是酚醛树脂

translation.en: It was very brittle.
translation.zh: ‎塑料是打碎的 非常脆

translation.en: Perhaps at its core, why it has really resonated throughout the years
translation.zh:
‎为什么能在这么多年
‎都引起共鸣的核心问题是

translation.en: is that it was the first time and perhaps only time
translation.zh:
‎是因为这是第一次
‎也许也是唯一一次

translation.en: where the United States Air Force,
translation.zh: ‎美国空军

translation.en: and maybe it was still called Army Air Force at the time,
translation.zh: ‎他们那时候可能还叫陆军航空队

translation.en: authorized a newspaper article that said, "We have captured a flying saucer."
translation.zh:
‎授权了一篇报纸文章说：
‎“我们缴获了一架飞碟”

translation.en: [narrator] In Washington, that newspaper report created turmoil.
translation.zh:
‎在华盛顿
‎这份报纸的报道引发了混乱

translation.en: And say that you're the President of the United States.
translation.zh: ‎假设你是美国总统

translation.en: You're Harry Truman. What do you do with that information?
translation.zh:
‎你是哈里·杜鲁门
‎你会怎么处理这些信息？

translation.en: If you tell the world that it's real,
translation.zh: ‎如果你告诉全世界这是真的

translation.en: first of all, you don't know, are they hostile or friendly.
translation.zh:
‎首先 你不知道他们的态度
‎是敌对的还是友好的？

translation.en: Basically it's informally
translation.zh: ‎基本可以说是

translation.en: the moment that Truman sent the authorization to Roger Ramey down at Dallas Fort Worth,
translation.zh:
‎杜鲁门把授权书交给了
‎在达拉斯沃斯堡的罗杰·雷米的那刻

translation.en: that press release out of Roswell Air Force Ba--, army air force base,
translation.zh:
‎他说“罗斯威尔空军基地
‎发出的那份新闻稿

translation.en: that has got to be reversed, immediately,
translation.zh: ‎必须立刻扭转”

translation.en: because if the press get to Roswell in time to start interviewing people all over town,
translation.zh:
‎如果媒体及时赶到罗斯威尔
‎开始采访镇上各种的人

translation.en: this is out, this is done.
translation.zh:
‎这个消息所有人就都知道了
‎这就完了

translation.en: [narrator] The White House ordered a complete lockdown
translation.zh: ‎白宫下令全面封锁

translation.en: of all information and personnel connected with the Roswell Incident.
translation.zh:
‎所有与罗斯威尔事件有关的
‎信息和人员

translation.en: Major Jesse Marcel was ordered to return to base immediately.
translation.zh: ‎杰西·马塞尔少校奉命立即返回基地

translation.en: The information about the crash of an extraterrestrial vessel
translation.zh: ‎那些被过早发布给公众的

translation.en: that had been prematurely released to the public had to be played down.
translation.zh:
‎关于一艘外星飞船坠毁的信息
‎必须淡出大家的视野

translation.en: The UFO genie had to be put back in the bottle, at all costs.
translation.zh:
‎不明飞行物这个精灵
‎必须不惜一切代价放回瓶子里

translation.en: The very same day they hold a late press conference,
translation.zh:
‎就在同一天
‎他们举行了一个晚间新闻发布会

translation.en: later in the day, they get Jesse Marcel senior back there.
translation.zh:
‎当天晚些时候
‎他们把老杰西·马塞尔带回到基地

translation.en: They get him in a room to hold up some Reynolds Wrap
translation.zh:
‎他们让他拿着一些雷诺牌的铝箔纸
‎进入一个房间

translation.en: that might've been wrapping Roger Ramey's fish in the freezer and say,
translation.zh:
‎那可能是在冰箱里包裹
‎罗杰·雷米的鱼的铝箔纸 然后说

translation.en: "Weather balloon. It was just a weather balloon."
translation.zh:
‎“气象探测气球！
‎那只是一个气象探测气球”

translation.en: And, the press goes, "Oh, okay, right, no problem…"
translation.zh: ‎媒体说：“好吧 没问题”

translation.en: [man] They debunked the whole thing and said,
translation.zh: ‎他们推翻了之前的整个说法 然后说

translation.en: "Oops, it was a mistake. We just saw a balloon"
translation.zh:
‎“不好意思 搞错了
‎我们看见的只是个气球而已”

translation.en: and it was completely forgotten.
translation.zh: ‎这件事被完全遗忘了

translation.en: I think initially they might have thought it was even a Russian weapon or something
translation.zh:
‎我想一开始他们可能认为
‎这是个俄罗斯的武器之类的

translation.en: to cover-- that was for the referral cover up for the… [coughing]
translation.zh:
‎这就导致了近期的掩盖行为
‎他们改变了一个说法

translation.en: …various stories. But later, it was determined it was not a Russian…
translation.zh:
‎这就导致了近期的掩盖行为
‎他们改变了一个说法 ‎后来 那被确定为不是苏联所属

translation.en: That left one other possibility, that it was something from out of our atmosphere.
translation.zh:
‎这就剩下了唯一的可能
‎那是来自我们大气层外的东西

translation.en: If the UFO, the flying saucer at the time, phenomena gets out of the bag
translation.zh:
‎如果不明飞行物 也就是飞碟现象
‎在那时被弄得人尽皆知

translation.en: and people across the country are afraid, like, of a War of the Worlds scenario,
translation.zh:
‎全国各地的人们都害怕出现
‎《世界大战》里的场景

translation.en: that we're going to have laser ships destroying society.
translation.zh:
‎会有发射激光的飞碟
‎摧毁我们的社会

translation.en: That means the Air Force has failed
translation.zh: ‎那也就意味着 空军没有

translation.en: in creating this sense of safety amongst the populace.
translation.zh: ‎给民众创造一种安全感

translation.en: [narrator] Given the circumstances of the time,
translation.zh: ‎考虑到当时的情况

translation.en: it's not surprising that an initiative emerged within the Pentagon
translation.zh:
‎五角大楼内部出现的一项方案
‎也就不足为奇了

translation.en: to establish a program to investigate the UFO phenomenon.
translation.zh: ‎建立一个调查不明飞行物现象的项目

translation.en: The foundations were laid
translation.zh: ‎这也就为蓝皮书计划

translation.en: for the creation of the longest and most wide-spanning
translation.zh: ‎这项历时最长、跨度最大

translation.en: government UFO monitoring program: Project Blue Book.
translation.zh:
‎政府不明飞行物监控项目
‎奠定了基础

translation.en: Project Blue book was run by the United States Air Force
translation.zh: ‎蓝皮书计划由美国空军管理

translation.en: and it was the best known of
translation.zh: ‎美国政府在早期开展的 ‎在三个不明飞行物研究和调查项目中

translation.en: the three UFO research and investigation programs that the US government
translation.zh: ‎在三个不明飞行物研究和调查项目中 ‎那是最著名的

translation.en: had had in the early days.
translation.zh: ‎那是最著名的

translation.en: Starting in 1947 with Project Sign
translation.zh: ‎调查开始于1947年的迹象计划

translation.en: and then evolving into Project Grudge.
translation.zh: ‎后来演变成积怨计划

translation.en: Project Blue book was, I think a genuine attempt
translation.zh:
‎我认为蓝皮书计划 ‎是调查不明飞行物目击事件的
‎一次真正尝试

translation.en: to investigate UFO sightings
translation.zh:
‎是调查不明飞行物目击事件的
‎一次真正尝试

translation.en: and come to some sort of assessment of the phenomenon.
translation.zh: ‎也是对这一现象进行的某种评估

translation.en: [Salla] They really needed to get as much information as they could
translation.zh: ‎他们真的需要尽可能多的信息

translation.en: from private citizens who saw the craft, who could report if the craft had landed,
translation.zh:
‎从看到飞船的普通市民那里得到
‎如果飞船着陆了 他们可以报告

translation.en: who was inside of the craft,
translation.zh: ‎飞行器里面有谁

translation.en: with people who were being taken inside of the craft
translation.zh:
‎人们是否被带进飞船
‎是否被展示过某些东西

translation.en: and being shown things. So all of this information they needed
translation.zh:
‎人们是否被带进飞船
‎是否被展示过某些东西 ‎所以他们需要所有这些信息

translation.en: and the best way for them to get it was to have this Project Blue Book set up
translation.zh:
‎对他们来说
‎最好的办法就是建立这个蓝皮书计划

translation.en: so that it could act as a kind of veneer for people to report UFO sightings.
translation.zh:
‎对他们来说
‎最好的办法就是建立这个蓝皮书计划 ‎这样就可以作为人们
‎报告不明飞行物目击事件的一种伪装

translation.en: Project Sign was sort of like this high watermark of…
translation.zh: ‎标志计划处于一种高水平线上

translation.en: "Hey, there's something going on." "No, there's not."
translation.zh:
‎“喂 这里发生了什么” ‎“没有 没发生什么 我们对此
‎有积怨 什么都没发生”

translation.en: "We got a grudge against this, there's nothing going on."
translation.zh:
‎“没有 没发生什么 我们对此
‎有积怨 什么都没发生”

translation.en: And then that was disbanded and led to the creation of Project Blue Book.
translation.zh:
‎后来这个计划被终止了
‎于是就创造了蓝皮书计划

translation.en: [narrator] The newly formed team is about to face a truly spectacular warmup round
translation.zh:
‎新组建的队伍即将面临一场
‎真正精彩的热身准备

translation.en: with an incident directly above the nation's capital
translation.zh: ‎国家首都的正上方发生了一起事件

translation.en: observed by countless numbers of people.
translation.zh: ‎被无数人目睹

translation.en: I do believe probably the most significant case in Blue Book was 1952.
translation.zh:
‎我相信蓝皮书中
‎最重要的案例是1952年

translation.en: Because we have a case here, a lot of people say,
translation.zh:
‎因为我们有个案例… ‎许多人说：
‎“我绝不会相信不明飞行物

translation.en: "I'm not going to believe in UFOs unless they land on the lawn in Washington, D.C."
translation.zh:
‎许多人说：
‎“我绝不会相信不明飞行物 ‎除非不明飞行物
‎降落在华盛顿特区的草坪上” ‎真的发生了这样的事
‎不明飞行物在低空盘旋、嗡嗡飞过

translation.en: Well, they practically did. They buzzed, they flew over.
translation.zh:
‎真的发生了这样的事
‎不明飞行物在低空盘旋、嗡嗡飞过

translation.en: [narrator] July, 1952.
Washington, D.C.
translation.zh: ‎华盛顿特区

translation.en: We bring you the dramatic story
translation.zh: ‎我们将为您讲述戏剧性的故事

translation.en: of what happened over our nation's capital just one week ago tonight.
translation.zh:
‎就是一周前的今晚
‎发生在我们国家首都的事情

translation.en: [narrator] Air traffic controller Edward Nugent
translation.zh:
‎空中交通管制员爱德华·纽金特
‎注意到七个不明飞行物

translation.en: noticed seven unidentified flying objects on his radar screen
translation.zh:
‎空中交通管制员爱德华·纽金特
‎注意到七个不明飞行物 ‎出现在他的雷达屏幕上
‎位置在授权空域之外

translation.en: outside of authorized airspace.
translation.zh:
‎出现在他的雷达屏幕上
‎位置在授权空域之外

translation.en: He reported them to his superior.
translation.zh: ‎他向上级报告了情况

translation.en: It was also confirmed by two other controllers.
translation.zh: ‎另外两名空管人员也证实了这一消息

translation.en: At nearby Andrews Air Force Base,
translation.zh: ‎在附近的安德鲁斯空军基地

translation.en: Airman William Brady also reported sightings of objects resembling fireballs,
translation.zh:
‎飞行员威廉·布雷迪也报告说
‎看到了类似火球的物体

translation.en: whose speed and maneuverability were unlike anything he'd ever seen.
translation.zh:
‎那种物体的速度和机动性
‎他从未见过

translation.en: We asked him to describe it, he said he couldn't describe it.
translation.zh:
‎我们请他描述一下 ‎他说他无法描述
‎那就是一团小小的白色光点

translation.en: It was just a small white light.
translation.zh:
‎他说他无法描述
‎那就是一团小小的白色光点

translation.en: [narrator] So did S.C. Pierman, a pilot waiting for takeoff clearance at Washington National.
translation.zh:
‎在华盛顿国家机场等待起飞许可的
‎飞行员皮尔曼也这样说

translation.en: Inexplicably, Project Blue Book commander Edward J. Ruppelt
translation.zh:
‎莫名其妙的 蓝皮书计划指挥官
‎爱德华·朱皮特

translation.en: was only made aware of this incident much later.
translation.zh: ‎是在很久以后才知道这件事的

translation.en: The unknown object passed over the White House and the Capitol Building.
translation.zh: ‎不明物体飞过了白宫和国会大厦

translation.en: F94 Starfire jet fighters were scrambled from Andrews,
translation.zh:
‎F-94星火战斗机被派遣到了
‎安德鲁斯基地

translation.en: but the objects vanish.
translation.zh: ‎但不明物体消失了

translation.en: A week later, the incident occurred again,
translation.zh: ‎一周后 又发生了这样的事情

translation.en: with the same unidentified craft appearing in the skies above the Capitol.
translation.zh: ‎同一个不明飞行物出现在首都上空

translation.en: Project Blue Book spokesman Albert M. Chop
translation.zh: ‎蓝皮书计划发言人阿尔伯特·肖普

translation.en: denied reporters' requests to photograph the radar screens.
translation.zh: ‎拒绝了记者拍摄雷达屏幕的要求

translation.en: During this second incident,
translation.zh: ‎在第二起事件中

translation.en: Lieutenant William Patterson locked onto one of the objects,
translation.zh:
‎威廉·帕特森中尉
‎锁定了其中一个物体

translation.en: attempting to pursue it.
translation.zh: ‎试图去追捕它

translation.en: His efforts were futile. It was far too fast.
translation.zh:
‎他的努力全是徒劳
‎那个物体速度太快了

translation.en: The unknown objects tracked on the radar were moving at unbelievable speeds,
translation.zh:
‎雷达追踪到的未知物体
‎以难以置信的速度移动

translation.en: ranging from 1,150 to over 7,000 miles per hour.
translation.zh:
‎速度可能达到
‎每小时1850千米到11265千米

translation.en: [Rojas] Project Blue Book investigators were ready
translation.zh: ‎蓝皮书计划的调查人员已经准备就绪

translation.en: and when they started happening again, they went to the National airport,
translation.zh:
‎当这种情况再次发生时
‎他们就去了国家机场

translation.en: they took over the control panel,
translation.zh: ‎他们接管了控制面板

translation.en: they took over the control tower
translation.zh: ‎他们接管了控制塔

translation.en: and they witnessed this UFO encounter themselves.
translation.zh: ‎他们亲眼目睹了这次不明飞行物事件

translation.en: They saw the jets being scrambled,
translation.zh:
‎他们看到了飞机起飞
‎看到了雷达上的显示

translation.en: they saw the radars, they were right there at the time
translation.zh:
‎他们看到了飞机起飞
‎看到了雷达上的显示 ‎他们当时就在那里

translation.en: and they weren't able to determine what it was.
translation.zh: ‎他们无法确定那是什么东西

translation.en: It's an amazing episode of history
translation.zh: ‎这是历史上不可思议的一段插曲

translation.en: that a president who is very calm and controlled like Truman,
translation.zh:
‎一个像杜鲁门这样非常冷静
‎有自控力的总统

translation.en: who is not prone to flights of fancy, or, you know, panicking,
translation.zh: ‎这个不喜欢幻想或者恐慌的人

translation.en: got angry enough about the situation he called the director of Project Blue Book
translation.zh:
‎对这种情况感到非常生气
‎于是给蓝皮书计划的负责人打了电话

translation.en: and he said, "What the hell is going on?"
translation.zh: ‎他说：“到底发生了什么？”

translation.en: And he scrambled fighter jets to shoot these things down.
translation.zh: ‎他紧急出动战斗机来把这些东西击落

translation.en: [Rojas] Was-- these jet fighters were chasing, and that were outrunning them.
translation.zh:
‎这些喷气式战斗机
‎追逐着不明飞行物 根本追不上

translation.en: A very similar incident to what we see at the-- in the Nimitz,
translation.zh:
‎和现在新闻中正火爆的
‎我们在尼米兹号事件上

translation.en: that's making the news right now or the Roosevelt,
translation.zh:
‎和现在新闻中正火爆的
‎我们在尼米兹号事件上  ‎或是罗斯福号上看到的情况 ‎非常相似
‎罗斯福事件也制造了新闻热度

translation.en: which was also making news.
translation.zh:
‎非常相似
‎罗斯福事件也制造了新闻热度

translation.en: So it's a repeat of what keeps happening where these things show up.
translation.zh: ‎所以不断发生的情况 又重复了一次 ‎这些东西出现 我们就去追

translation.en: We chase them, they outmaneuver our best technology
translation.zh: ‎这些东西出现 我们就去追 ‎他们在技术上远超我们最好的科技

translation.en: and we have no idea what the heck they are.
translation.zh: ‎我们根本不知道他们到底是什么

translation.en: [narrator] The country was in the midst of a Cold War and people feared global conflict.
translation.zh:
‎国家正处于冷战时期
‎人们害怕全球性冲突

translation.en: When unknown craft flew in formation over the nation's capital,
translation.zh: ‎当一架不明飞行器飞过首都上空时

translation.en: something had to be done.
translation.zh: ‎我们就必须要做些什么了

translation.en: On July 29th, 1952,
an extraordinary press conference was held at the Pentagon.
translation.zh:
‎五角大楼举行了一场
‎特别的新闻发布会

translation.en: The largest press conference since World War II was held at the Pentagon
translation.zh:
‎这是第二次世界大战后 在五角大楼
‎举行的最大一次新闻发布会

translation.en: and Major General John Alexander Samford
translation.zh: ‎约翰·亚历山大·桑福德少校

translation.en: spoke to the public, along with other military officers
translation.zh: ‎向公众和其他军官发表讲话

translation.en: about the sightings.
translation.zh: ‎发表关于飞碟目击的讲话

translation.en: We can say that the recent sightings are in no way connected
translation.zh: ‎我们可以说最近的目击事件… ‎（约翰·桑福德 美国空军将军）

translation.en: with any secret development by any agency of the United States.
translation.zh:
‎…和美国任何机构的秘密开发项目
‎都毫无关联

translation.en: General Samford stated that these things have been seen in the sky
translation.zh:
‎桑福德将军说 ‎这些在天空中出现的东西
‎可以追溯到圣经时代

translation.en: dating back to biblical times,
translation.zh:
‎这些在天空中出现的东西
‎可以追溯到圣经时代

translation.en: that there are credible people who are seeing incredible things,
translation.zh: ‎有信徒看到了不可思议的东西

translation.en: that you can't explain any of this except for phenomena.
translation.zh: ‎除了看到现象 你无法解释任何事情

translation.en: However, there have been a certain percentage of this volume of reports
translation.zh:
‎但是 在这些报告中
‎有一定百分比的报告

translation.en: that have been made by credible observers of relatively incredible things.
translation.zh:
‎是由可靠的观察者 观察到的
‎相对难以置信的事物

translation.en: It is this group of observations that we now are attempting to resolve.
translation.zh: ‎我们现在正试图研究这种观察结果

translation.en: [narrator] This was perhaps the one and only time in history
translation.zh: ‎这也许是历史上唯一的一次

translation.en: when the military command of a global superpower
translation.zh: ‎一个全球超级大国的军事部队

translation.en: issued a public response to documented UFO sightings
translation.zh: ‎对不明飞行物目击事件发表公开回应

translation.en: and admitted that it was at a loss to explain them.
translation.zh: ‎并承认自己难以解释这种现象

translation.en: It was the first official admission
translation.zh: ‎这是第一次官方承认

translation.en: that extraterrestrial craft of superior speed and maneuverability
translation.zh:
‎那艘速度和机动性
‎都极其好的外星飞船

translation.en: had been observed in the Earth's atmosphere.
translation.zh: ‎被人们在地球大气层中观测到

translation.en: And that shook them up.
translation.zh: ‎这让大家吓坏了

translation.en: Because they can't stop it.
translation.zh: ‎因为他们无法阻止这艘飞碟

translation.en: They try to come up with a cover story. Nobody believed it.
translation.zh:
‎他们想要编造一个故事来掩盖事实
‎但没人相信

translation.en: [narrator] The flights over Washington seem to announce to the world:
translation.zh:
‎飞碟在华盛顿上空的飞行
‎似乎向全世界宣布

translation.en: "We are here. You can count on our involvement."
translation.zh:
‎“我们来了
‎你们可以倚仗我们的参与”

translation.en: "Nuclear weapons can endanger not only you, but the entire planet
translation.zh:
‎“核武器不仅会危及你们 ‎还会危及整个星球
‎以及外部尚未被发现的世界

translation.en: and as yet undiscovered worlds beyond it."
translation.zh:
‎还会危及整个星球
‎以及外部尚未被发现的世界

translation.en: To this day, UFOs are sighted near bases with nuclear arsenals,
translation.zh:
‎直到今天 在有核武器库的基地附近
‎还能看到不明飞行物

translation.en: and in at least two documented cases,
translation.zh: ‎在至少两个有记录的案例中

translation.en: the coded activation system was inexplicably tampered with.
translation.zh: ‎编码激活系统被莫名其妙地篡改了

translation.en: In 2010, UFO expert Robert Hastings states:
translation.zh:
‎2010年 不明飞行物专家
‎罗伯特·黑斯廷斯所说

translation.en: "Declassified US government documents
translation.zh: ‎解密的美国政府文件

translation.en: and witness testimony from former or retired US military personnel
translation.zh:
‎还有离职或退休的
‎美国军人的目击证词

translation.en: confirm beyond any doubt,
translation.zh: ‎都毫无疑问地证明了

translation.en: ongoing UFO incursions close to nuclear weapons facilities."
translation.zh:
‎持续不断的不明飞行物入侵
‎地点都接近于核武器设施

translation.en: But information about this is kept under wraps and denied.
translation.zh: ‎但这方面的信息一直被保密与否认

translation.en: And so, how do you keep that under wraps?
translation.zh: ‎那你如何保守这个秘密呢？

translation.en: Well, you use all of the spy craft tools and disinformation tools
translation.zh:
‎那就要运用所有的间谍工具 ‎以及我们在战争期间开发的
‎政府发布假情报工具

translation.en: and stuff that we had developed during the war.
translation.zh:
‎以及我们在战争期间开发的
‎政府发布假情报工具

translation.en: You formalize the CIA or the OSS, you create the NSA.
translation.zh:
‎把中情局从战略情报局中分离出来
‎建立了国家安全局

translation.en: And you use your technology,
translation.zh: ‎动用你的高科技

translation.en: you get in touch with publishers and key papers.
translation.zh: ‎与主流新闻报纸出版商联系

translation.en: You talk to the three networks
translation.zh: ‎和当时的三家电视网沟通 说

translation.en: and you say, "Look, you gotta work, play ball with us." And they did.
translation.zh: ‎“听着 你们必须和我们合作” ‎他们也照做了

translation.en: [man] Is there anything in the files,
translation.zh:
‎文件里是否有什么信息
‎不管是机密的还是非机密的

translation.en: either classified or unclassified that would indicate that there may be
translation.zh:
‎文件里是否有什么信息
‎不管是机密的还是非机密的 ‎可以证明我们头顶上
‎可能有外星访客？

translation.en: extraterrestrial visitors over here?
translation.zh:
‎可以证明我们头顶上
‎可能有外星访客？

translation.en: [Quintanilla] First of all,
translation.zh: ‎首先 这个项目是完全非机密的

translation.en: the project is completely unclassified
translation.zh:
‎首先 这个项目是完全非机密的 ‎（赫克托·金塔尼利亚
‎蓝皮书计划负责人）

translation.en: and there is nothing in the record that would indicate
translation.zh:
‎（赫克托·金塔尼利亚
‎蓝皮书计划负责人） ‎没有任何记录表明

translation.en: that we have been visited by any advanced civilization.
translation.zh: ‎任何先进的文明曾造访过我们

translation.en: [narrator] Despite authorities' efforts, these sightings would keep on coming,
translation.zh:
‎尽管当局尽了最大努力
‎但这些目击事件还是层出不穷

translation.en: confounding attempts to play down the whole notion of UFO phenomena.
translation.zh:
‎挫败当局
‎淡化不明飞行物现象的整体策略

translation.en: One of the cases that really impressed me in Project Blue Book was that in 1952,
translation.zh:
‎蓝皮书计划中 让我印象最深的
‎一个案例就是在1952年

translation.en: there was this sighting of a flying saucer
translation.zh: ‎有人说看到了一个飞碟

translation.en: in the vicinity of Desert Springs.
translation.zh: ‎就在沙漠泉附近

translation.en: And this was the place where George Adamski says
translation.zh: ‎这就是乔治·亚当斯基说的那个

translation.en: that he actually had his first encounter with a extraterrestrial from Venus.
translation.zh:
‎他第一次遇到
‎来自金星的一个外星人的地方

translation.en: And Adamski had six people that witnessed him having this encounter.
translation.zh:
‎有六个人都目睹了
‎亚当斯基见到外星人的事情

translation.en: [narrator] November, 1952. Desert Center, California.
translation.zh:
‎1952年11月
‎加利福尼亚州德瑟特森特

translation.en: George Adamski returns home from stargazing with friends.
translation.zh:
‎乔治·亚当斯基当时
‎和朋友们观星后往家走

translation.en: He was about to experience an encounter that would change his life.
translation.zh: ‎他即将经历一场改变他一生的相逢

translation.en: First, he recalls a cigar-shaped object appearing in the sky.
translation.zh:
‎开始的时候 他回忆起天空中
‎出现了一个雪茄形状的物体

translation.en: Others in the group were shocked,
translation.zh: ‎在场其他人都很震惊

translation.en: but George Adamski was not so easily fazed.
translation.zh:
‎但乔治·亚当斯基
‎并没有那么容易被吓到

translation.en: He left the group and walked towards where the craft had apparently landed.
translation.zh:
‎他离开了人群
‎朝明显是飞船降落的地方开去

translation.en: Adamski disappeared over the horizon just as the vessel appeared to land,
translation.zh:
‎亚当斯基就在飞船快要着陆的时候
‎消失在了地平线上方

translation.en: but from a distance, it is too hard to tell.
translation.zh: ‎但从远处看 情况就很难判断了

translation.en: Adamski returned just moments later with an alarming message.
translation.zh:
‎亚当斯基片刻后回来了
‎并带来了一条警告信息

translation.en: He said that he was warned by a being from Venus called Orthon
translation.zh: ‎他说有个叫奥逊的金星人警告了他

translation.en: about the threat of imminent nuclear war.
translation.zh: ‎关于迫在眉睫的核战争威胁的事情

translation.en: He tells them the Venutian communicated with him non-verbally.
translation.zh:
‎他告诉他们
‎金星人不是用语言与他沟通的

translation.en: I have, more or less,
translation.zh:
‎我或多或少做了一部分手势
‎还经历了心灵感应

translation.en: gestures of mental telepathy, as it is known, talk transfer.
translation.zh:
‎我或多或少做了一部分手势
‎还经历了心灵感应 ‎众所周知 就是交流转换器

translation.en: [man] He does not speak?
translation.zh: ‎他不会说话吗？

translation.en: He didn't at the time but I have met him since
translation.zh: ‎那时他没有说话 但后来我还见过他

translation.en: and he does speak very well English as well as any other language.
translation.zh:
‎他话说得非常好
‎擅长英语还有其他语言

translation.en: [Salla] They saw the UFO, they actually even saw a cigar-shaped craft in the vicinity.
translation.zh:
‎他们看到了不明飞行物 他们甚至
‎在附近看到了一艘雪茄形状的飞船

translation.en: So these witnesses, uh, they gave their testimony to a local newspaper,
translation.zh:
‎这些证人向当地的一家报社
‎提供了证词

translation.en: they took some soil samples to support what Adamski said,
translation.zh:
‎他们采集了一些土壤样本
‎来支持亚当斯基所说的

translation.en: that he had a real life meeting, and in the Project Blue Book files
translation.zh: ‎他和外星人在现实世界见面了 ‎在蓝皮书计划的文件中

translation.en: there was another person,
translation.zh: ‎还有另一个人

translation.en: independent of Adamski and his six witnesses
translation.zh:
‎跟亚当斯基和他的六个目击证人
‎不认识的一个人

translation.en: who said that they, they reported a UFO sighting
translation.zh:
‎说他们就在亚当斯基
‎见到不明飞行物的

translation.en: in the precise area where Adamski had his encounter.
translation.zh:
‎那个地方 报告了
‎一起不明飞行物目击事件

translation.en: [narrator] On December 13th, 1952,
George Adamski claims to have photographed a UFO.
translation.zh:
‎乔治·亚当斯基声称
‎自己拍下了一张不明飞行物的照片

translation.en: The image was debunked and compared to a surgical lamp.
translation.zh:
‎这张照片被公之于众
‎大家将其外形比作一个手术灯

translation.en: Which of George Adamski's claims were true?
translation.zh: ‎乔治·亚当斯基说的哪些话是真的？

translation.en: Project Blue Book commander, Edward J. Ruppelt,
translation.zh: ‎蓝皮书计划指挥官爱德华·朱皮特

translation.en: and his scientific advisor, Joseph Allen Hynek,
translation.zh:
‎和他的科学顾问
‎约瑟夫·艾伦·海尼克

translation.en: took an interest in Adamski.
translation.zh: ‎对亚当斯基非常感兴趣

translation.en: In his 1956 memoirs, Ruppelt writes:
translation.zh: ‎朱皮特在1956年的回忆录中写道

translation.en: "To look at the man and to listen to his story,
translation.zh: ‎“看着这个人 听着他讲的故事

translation.en: you immediately felt an urge to believe him."
translation.zh:
‎你立刻感到一种
‎想要相信他的急迫感”

translation.en: Decades later it is clear, not only from Ruppelt's memoirs,
translation.zh:
‎几十年后 不仅从朱皮特的回忆录中
‎可以清楚地看到

translation.en: but also from the testimony of other direct participants in Project Blue Book
translation.zh:
‎从蓝皮书计划
‎其他直接参与者的证词也能看到

translation.en: that the project manipulated facts, especially in its later phase.
translation.zh:
‎这个项目 特别是在其进行的后期
‎篡改了事实

translation.en: Some cases were filed with a blatant effort
translation.zh:
‎有些案例的记录
‎有很明显的篡改痕迹

translation.en: to avoid any unexplainable or unidentified phenomena.
translation.zh:
‎来避免出现任何
‎无法解释或不明的现象

translation.en: There was a policy instituted at that time, in 1953
translation.zh: ‎当时制定了一项政策 ‎在1953年和1954年

translation.en: and in 1954, there were two new Air Force regulations
translation.zh: ‎在1953年和1954年 ‎空军有两项新规定开始实施

translation.en: put into effect that, essentially,
translation.zh: ‎空军有两项新规定开始实施 ‎基本上 空军没有解释的

translation.en: any information that was not explained by the Air Force
translation.zh: ‎基本上 空军没有解释的 ‎任何信息

translation.en: was to go through a different process, a different system,
translation.zh:
‎都要经过另一个过程
‎另一个系统处理

translation.en: and that only the information
translation.zh: ‎只有可以被确认为

translation.en: that could be identified as conventional craft
translation.zh: ‎是传统飞行器的信息

translation.en: could be told to the public and to the media.
translation.zh: ‎才可以被公布于大众和媒体

translation.en: The whole idea was to say, "We're taking it seriously," when they weren't taking it seriously,
translation.zh:
‎整个想法就是在说：“我们在
‎认真对待这件事”但他们并没有

translation.en: they just wanted information,
translation.zh: ‎他们只是想要收集信息

translation.en: but they would interpret it one way for the public,
translation.zh: ‎但他们向公众解释是一种方式

translation.en: they'd interpret it another way for themselves
translation.zh: ‎他们向自己解释又是另一种方式 ‎因为他们知道这些都是真实的

translation.en: because they knew this was real.
translation.zh: ‎因为他们知道这些都是真实的

translation.en: You're a publisher and they come and say, "This is national security."
translation.zh:
‎如果你是个出版社
‎而他们说：“这事关国家安全”

translation.en: "We cannot have significant investigations of this."
translation.zh: ‎“我们不能就此展开重大调查”

translation.en: "You can write some articles but do not challenge our position on this."
translation.zh:
‎“你可以写一些文章 但不要挑战
‎我们在这个问题上的立场”

translation.en: "It's for the benefit of the nation."
translation.zh: ‎“这是为了国家利益”

translation.en: And what is the publisher going to do? "Ah, screw you."
translation.zh:
‎出版社会怎么做？只会说：
‎“去你的吧！”

translation.en: [narrator] Project Blue Book's most famous commander was Captain Edward J. Ruppelt,
translation.zh:
‎蓝皮书计划中最著名的指挥官
‎就是爱德华·朱皮特上尉

translation.en: a decorated World War II pilot,
translation.zh: ‎他是一名获勋的二战飞行员

translation.en: who, incidentally, coined the term Unidentified Flying Object.
translation.zh:
‎碰巧也是创造了
‎“不明飞行物”这个词语的人

translation.en: After resigning from his post, Ruppelt wrote the book
translation.zh:
‎辞去职务后 ‎朱皮特写了本书
‎《关于不明飞行物的报告》

translation.en: The Report on Unidentified Flying Objects,
translation.zh:
‎朱皮特写了本书
‎《关于不明飞行物的报告》

translation.en: which to this day provides readers with a very solid picture
translation.zh:
‎直到今天 这本书依旧为读者提供了
‎一种非常真实的画面

translation.en: of what happened behind the scenes of military investigations
translation.zh:
‎讲述在1947年和1955年之间
‎所出现的现象

translation.en: into the phenomenon between 1947 and 1955.
translation.zh: ‎军事调查的幕后到底发生了什么

translation.en: [Dolan] Ruppelt and his people
translation.zh: ‎朱皮特和他的人

translation.en: were very strongly looking at the extraterrestrial hypothesis.
translation.zh: ‎非常重视外星人假说

translation.en: But in later years, Blue Book was explicitly given orders
translation.zh:
‎但在后来几年
‎蓝皮书收到了来自军队

translation.en: by the Air Force, by the military
translation.zh: ‎来自空军的明确命令

translation.en: to explain all of these…
translation.zh: ‎让他们解释所有这些无法解释的案例

translation.en: unexplained cases and just to give them explanations:
translation.zh: ‎让他们解释所有这些无法解释的案例 ‎只是为了给人们一些解释

translation.en: weather balloon, a hoax or media or whatever.
translation.zh: ‎气象气球、恶作剧、流星什么的

translation.en: Uh, and they got their percentage of unknowns down very, very low.
translation.zh:

at the prestigious Battelle Memorial Institute.
